viewerExamples.title: Basic Donut Chart
viewerExamples.code:
const data = [
  { name: 'Direct', value: 1234 },
  { name: 'Referral', value: 829 },
  { name: 'Social', value: 645 },
  { name: 'Organic', value: 423 },
  { name: 'Other', value: 189 },
];

<DonutChart
  data={data}
  category="value"
  index="name"
/>

viewerExamples.title: Pie Chart Variant
viewerExamples.code:
<DonutChart
  data={data}
  category="value"
  index="name"
  variant="pie"
  valueFormatter={(value) => `${value} visits`}
/>
